dict.acceptation: [宗]教堂；[宗]教徒；[宗]教派；[宗]教会；
领…到教堂接受宗教仪式；

sent.orig: Marriage in a church according to the rites of the Church of England or Church.
sent.trans: 按照英国国教或天主教的礼仪在教堂结婚。

sent.orig: Milliken Chinese Community Church (Milliken Church) held its first worship service at Good Shepherd Community Church.
sent.trans: 美坚华人基督教会（美坚堂）借用善牧教会举行首次崇拜。

sent.orig: Marriage in a church according to the rites of the Church of England or Catholic Church.
sent.trans: 一、按照英国国教或天主教的礼仪在教堂结婚。

sent.orig: Our church is the only Chinese Church in the Northland of the Kansas City Metropolitan area.
sent.trans: 我们的教会是堪城北部唯一的中国教会。

sent.orig: This website is are owned by Yaumatei Wendell Church, the Evangelical Free Church of China.
sent.trans: 中国基督教播道会油麻地道真堂是本网站的拥有人。
